title: German SPD party ignites its election campaign
description:
(1 Aug 2017) The German Social Democrats (SPD) on Tuesday presented their election campaign at the party's headquarters in Berlin ahead of a nationwide poll on 24 September.
SPD general secretary Hubertus Heil presented five posters centred around the themes on which the party would fight the election, and one poster showing the party's leading candidate for Chancellor Martin Schulz 
Chancellor Angela Merkel is seeking a fourth term in September's national parliamentary election. 
Polls indicate that Merkel's conservatives, and her personal popularity, have recovered ahead of the election.
